DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergo placement endotracheal tube ( ETT ) standard care . Tracheal lavage conduct use 5 mL sterile saline solution push/suction technique . Specimen sample obtain wall suction collect 2 time point follow intubation . Blood sample obtain 2 time point , simultaneous collection tracheal specimen .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Ages 18 65 2 . American Society Anesthesiologists Physical Status Classification ( ASA ) I II 3 . Required endotracheal intubation 4 . Scheduled short admission ( < 23 hr ) , ambulatory orthopedic surgery ( ankle , shoulder , extremity surgery ) ; general surgery ( exploratory laparotomy , cholecystectomy , ventral inguinal hernia repair ) ; obstetric/gynecological surgery ( total abdominal hysterectomy , bilateral salpingooophorectomy ) ; urologic surgery ( nephrectomy , prostatectomy ) , lumbar spine surgery ( discectomy , one two level lumbar fusion ) procedure . 5 . Estimated duration surgery 3 4 hour . 6 . Provide informed consent Exclusion Criteria 1 . Active pulmonary disease within 5 day prior enrollment 2 . On immunosuppressive medication 3 . Previous tracheal surgery 4 . On azithromycin 5 . Diabetes 6 . Pregnancy 7 . Smoking history le 6 week prior surgery 8 . Surgery intubation within 5 day surgery 9 . Planned surgical procedure involve neck thoracic region 10 . Active pulmonary disease 11 . Autoimmune disease ( HIV , AIDS , Rheumatoid Arthritis 12 . Hepatitis 13 . Cancer
